EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing New Storage and Cloud Features For Virtual Datacenter Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Today, VMTurbo announced the latest release of VMTurbo Operations Manager—version 4.0. New enhancements will even further extend your ability to control your virtual datacenter with our approach to software-defined control, which yields improvements to performance and reduction and/or deferral of infrastructure expense.
Check it out for yourself. Download the trial here <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM>.
New and enhanced feature offerings include:
- Data Storage - Enablements for new add-on modules to control storage resources supporting your virtual environment - Cloud Infrastructure - New add-on module for extending workloads to public cloud infrastructure, such as Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure
Learn more about these exciting new capabilities:
- Join our Webinar on June 18 <http://bit.ly/108Ukqz> - Read the Press Release <http://bit.ly/11da07n> and announcing version 4.0
Kind Regards
The VMTurbo Team
